issue.title: Relaunching of pinned apps is borked

content.raw:
I've had a go at a fix for this, will make pull requests soon.

The main complication was that the wrapper script we were using to launch apps in conda environments does not actually activate the environment, it only sets up some aspects of it. We need a little more than what it provides (one extra environment variable) for the apps to know enough about their environment to be able to create their relaunch commands. 

So the fix im considering is a similar wrapper script I've made that does what we want, and resolves a couple of other issues with how our apps are launched on Windows.
